Journey Was Started

More than 15,000 companies trust and choose Itech

2010

Humble Beginnings

Launched Highway Auto Spares with a clear mission—to provide quality and reliable car parts to our local community. Started with a small store and a big vision.

01
Expanding Footprint

Opened two additional locations to meet growing demand. Our dedication to providing top-notch service and products fueled this expansion.

02

2014

2017

Innovation in Service

Introduced a new loyalty program and streamlined our supply chain to ensure faster delivery times. These innovations improved the customer experience and strengthened our market position.

03
Customer-Centric Approach

Launched a 24/7 customer support service and a user-friendly mobile app, making it easier for customers to get the help they need, anytime, anywhere.

04

2019

2024

Community Engagement

Started a series of community outreach programs, including free car maintenance workshops and charity drives, deepening our connection with the communities we serve.

05

Highway Autosolution’s Philosophy

We believe that every vehicle deserves the highest quality service and every customer deserves a trustworthy, transparent, and stress-free experience. Our guiding principles reflect our dedication to excellence, innovation, and customer satisfaction.

Commitment to Quality and InnovationIntegrity and TransparencyCustomer-Centric Approach

Why Choose Us

With Highway Autosolutions, you are guaranteed: .
  • Expertise and Experience

    we pride ourselves on having a team of highly skilled and experienced automotive professionals. Our technicians undergo continuous training to stay updated with the latest advancements in automotive technology.

  • Comprehensive Service Range

    We offer a comprehensive range of automotive services designed to meet all your car care needs.

  • Customer-Centric Approach

    Customer satisfaction is at the heart of everything we do at Highway Autosolutions. We believe in building long-term relationships with our customers by providing exceptional service and personalized care.
